<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An implementation of SipHash, a hash function optimized for speed on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// short inputs. Based on the SipHash reference implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also provides one specific wrapper on top of SipHash-2-4-64 to compute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compute ABI-stable ptrauth discriminators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Computes a SipHash-2-4 64-bit result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a155c6d528429c339eb352bfe2a715fe7">getSipHash&#95;2&#95;4&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> In, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t (&amp;K)&#91;16&#93;,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Computes a SipHash-2-4 128-bit result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abc54d0205758f7b576ea87bd3ba70a5e">getSipHash&#95;2&#95;4&#95;128</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> In, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t (&amp;K)&#91;16&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        uint8&#95;t (&amp;Out)&#91;16&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute a stable non-zero 16-bit hash of the given string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The exact algorithm is the little-endian interpretation of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// non-doubled (i.e. 64-bit) result of applying a SipHash-2-4 using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a specific seed value which can be found in the source.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This 64-bit result is truncated to a non-zero 16-bit value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We use a 16-bit discriminator because ARM64 can efficiently load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a 16-bit immediate into the high bits of a register without disturbing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the remainder of the value, which serves as a nice blend operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 16 bits is also sufficiently compact to not inflate a loader relocation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We disallow zero to guarantee a different discriminator from the places</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in the ABI that use a constant zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint16&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a95bf65a141564e084f6fac52c00b6a6d">getPointerAuthStableSipHash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> S);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
